featured.text: In fact, the infant is the most vulnerable member of society to this chemical.
As of 1997, the orphanage, which depends on private contributions, has saved more than 100 infants.
The mother’s fear of loss especially makes sense since the infant/toddler years of life are fragile ones.

definition.zh_def: 嬰兒；剛出生不久的幼兒。
definition.en_def: A very young child, especially one that is just born or not yet walking.
definition.example: The infant slept peacefully in her crib.
